channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- VM Backups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- VM Backups

item.title: CVE-2021-24173|2024-08-03T19:21:18.724Z -- unknown -- vm%20backups
item.description: The VM Backups WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF checks, allowing attackers to make a logged in user unwanted actions, such as update the plugin's options, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.

item.title: CVE-2021-24172|2024-08-03T19:21:18.693Z -- unknown -- vm%20backups
item.description: The VM Backups WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have CSRF checks, allowing attackers to make a logged in user unwanted actions, such as generate backups of the DB, plugins, and current .
